Ancient Resolve.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Increase the duration of your shield by {scale=0.5|0.5} seconds.

Barrier Reef.card_desc: [Shell Shield] For every 3000 damage absorbed reduce the cooldown of Shell Shield by {scale=1|1}s.

Carapace.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Increase the Health of Shell Shield by {scale=250|250}.

Crashing Wave.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Shell Spin's Cooldown is reduced by {scale=1|1}s for every enemy hit by it.

Determination.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing from other players.

Ebb and Flow.card_desc: [Armor] Upon reaching 40% health the Cooldown of Shell Spin is reduced by {scale=20|20}%

Half Shell.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Shell Shield is now placed on the ground, is not Channeled, and lasts 2s longer.

Harden.card_desc: [Dredge Anchor] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction for 2s after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor.

Leviathan.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Maximum Health by 600 and gain CC Immunity during Ancient Rage.

Pluck.card_desc: [Dredge Anchor] Gain 65% bonus damage on your first shot after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor.

Rampage.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed for 6s after getting an elimination.

Salvage.card_desc: [Dredge Anchor] Activating Dredge Anchor generates 1 Ammo every 0.5s for {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sea Legs.card_desc: [Dredge Anchor] Gain {scale=6|6}% lifesteal after hitting an enemy with Dredge Anchor.

Spring Tide.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Shell Spin heals you for {scale=250|250} for every enemy hit.

Strongarm.card_desc: [Dredge Anchor] Reduce the Cooldown of Dredge Anchor by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Surf.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Increase the distance Shell Spin travels by {scale=10|10}%

Tidal Grace.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Heal for {scale=50|50} Health per second during Shell Shield.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Shell Spin] For 2s after using Shell Spin you gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed.

Anmutige Welle.card_desc: [Panzerschild] Während Panzerschild wirst du {scale=50|50} LP pro Sekunde geheilt.

Barriereriff.card_desc: [Panzerschild] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Panzerschild für jeweils 3000 absorbierten Schaden um {scale=1|1}s.

Bergung.card_desc: [Schürfanker] Die Aktivierung von Schürfanker erzeugt {scale=0.5|0.5}s lang alle 0,5s 1 Munition.

Ebbe und Flut.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du unter 40% deiner Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Panzerwirbler um {scale=20|20}% reduziert.

Entschlossenheit.card_desc: [Rüstung] Unter 50% Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung von anderen Spielern.

Leviathan.card_desc: [Rüstung] Deine maximale Gesundheit wird um 600 LP erhöht und du erhältst während Alter Zorn CC-Immunität.

Panzerh\u00e4lfte.card_desc: [Panzerschild] Panzerschild wird auf dem Boden aktiviert und nicht kanalisiert. Die Dauer wird um 2s erhöht.

Raserei.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Eliminierungen 6s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Raufbold.card_desc: [Schürfanker] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schürfanker um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Schneid.card_desc: [Schürfanker] Dein erster Schuss, nachdem du einen Gegner mit Schürfanker getroffen hast, verursacht 65% Bonusschaden.

Seefest.card_desc: [Schürfanker] Nach Treffern mit Schürfanker erhältst du {scale=6|6}% Lebensraub.

Springflut.card_desc: [Panzerwirbler] Für jeden mit Panzerwirbler getroffenem Gegner wirst du {scale=250|250} LP geheilt.

Sturmwelle.card_desc: [Panzerwirbler] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Panzerwirbler pro damit getroffenem Gegner um {scale=1|1}s.

Surfen.card_desc: [Panzerwirbler] Erhöht die Weite von Panzerwirbler um {scale=10|10}%.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Panzerwirbler] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung von Panzerwirbler 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Uralter Wille.card_desc: [Panzerschild] Erhöht die Dauer von Panzerschild um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Verh\u00e4rtung.card_desc: [Schürfanker] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Schürfanker, wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Barri\u00e8re de corail.card_desc: [Bouclier carap.] Bouclier carapace se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite par tranche de 3000 dégâts absorbés.

Boulets all\u00e9g\u00e9s.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

Collecte.card_desc: [Ancre de drague] Activer Ancre de drague redonne 1 munition toutes les 0,5s pendant {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Cuirasse.card_desc: [Bouclier carap.] Bouclier carapace a {scale=250|250} PV de plus.

Demi-coquille.card_desc: [Bouclier carap.] Le Bouclier carapace est placé par terre plutôt que canalisé, et il dure 2s de plus.

D\u00e9termination.card_desc: [Armure] En-dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus en provenance des coéquipiers.

Douce mar\u00e9e.card_desc: [Vrille de carap.] Vrille de carapace vous rend {scale=250|250} PV par ennemi touché.

Force.card_desc: [Ancre de drague] Ancre de drague se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Gr\u00e2ce des mar\u00e9es.card_desc: [Bouclier carap.] Pendant Bouclier carapace, vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV/s.

L\u00e9viathan.card_desc: [Armure] Vous avez 600 PV supplémentaires. De plus, pendant Rage ancestrale, vous êtes immunisé aux contrôles.

Mar\u00e9es.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en-dessous de 40% de santé réduit le temps de recharge de Vrille de carapace de {scale=20|20}%.

Pied marin.card_desc: [Ancre de drague] Si Ancre de drague touche un ennemi, vous obtenez {scale=6|6}% de drain de vie.

Raz-de-mar\u00e9e.card_desc: [Vrille de carap.] Si Vrille de carapace touche un ennemi, son temps de recharge est réduit de {scale=1|1}s.

Renforcement.card_desc: [Ancre de drague] Pendant 2s après avoir touché un ennemi avec Ancre de drague, vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins.

R\u00e9solution antique.card_desc: [Bouclier carap.] Bouclier carapace dure {scale=0.5|0.5}s de plus.

Saccager.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 6s.

Surf.card_desc: [Vrille de carap.] La distance de Vrille de carapace augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Tir d\u00e9collant.card_desc: [Ancre de drague] Quand Ancre de drague touche un ennemi, votre prochain tir inflige 65% de dégâts supplémentaires.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Vrille de carap.] Pendant 2s après Vrille de carapace, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

\u51b2\u6d6a.card_desc: [旋转外壳] 增加你旋转外壳的移动距离{scale=10|10}%

\u51b3\u610f.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u575a\u56fa.card_desc: [重型船锚] 技能命中敌人后的2秒内，你受到的伤害将减少{scale=5|5}%

\u5927\u5821\u7901.card_desc: [甲壳护盾] 每吸收3000伤害，甲壳护盾的冷却时间就减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u6253\u635e.card_desc: [重型船锚] 使用重型船锚后{scale=0.5|0.5}秒内，每0.5秒获得1发弹药

\u62a4\u76fe\u6295\u5c04.card_desc: [甲壳护盾] 甲壳护盾现在会固定在脚下，无需持续施法，且持续时间增加2秒

\u65e0\u60c5\u6d77\u6d6a.card_desc: [旋转外壳] 每命中一名敌人，旋转外壳的冷却时间就会降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u6655\u8239.card_desc: [重型船锚] 重型船锚命中敌人之后你将获得{scale=6|6}%的生命偷取

\u66b4\u6012.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人或获得助攻将使你的移动速度提高{scale=8|8}%，持续6秒

\u6d77\u5578.card_desc: [旋转外壳] 旋转外壳激活后的两秒内，你将获得{scale=8|8}%移动速度加成

\u6d77\u5996\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高1200点，在远古之怒期间免疫控制效果

\u6da8\u6f6e.card_desc: [旋转外壳] 旋转外壳命中敌人时将回复你{scale=250|250}点生命值

\u6f6e\u6c50\u4e4b\u8d50.card_desc: [甲壳护盾] 技能激活时，每秒治疗你{scale=50|50}生命值

\u6f6e\u8d77\u6f6e\u843d.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于40%时旋转外壳的冷却时间降低{scale=20|20}%

\u7532\u58f3.card_desc: [甲壳护盾] 增加甲壳护盾的生命值{scale=250|250}

\u8239\u951a\u5904\u51b3.card_desc: [重型船锚] 重型船锚钩中目标后，对其进行的首次普通攻击会造成65%额外伤害

\u8f7b\u76c8\u70ae\u5f39.card_desc: [武器] 弹药装填速度增加{scale=7|7}%

\u8fdc\u53e4\u575a\u6bc5.card_desc: [甲壳护盾] 增加你护盾的持续时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u94c1\u81c2.card_desc: [重型船锚] 减少重型船锚的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

Ancient Resolve.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Increase the duration of your shield by 0.5 seconds.

Barrier Reef.card_desc: [Shell Shield] For every 2000 damage absorbed reduce the cooldown of Shell Shield by 1 second.

Crashing Wave.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Shell Spin's Cooldown is reduced by 1s if it hits an enemy.

Harden.card_desc: [Ancient Rage] Increase the Health bonus of Ancient Rage by 250.

Rampage.card_desc: [Ancient Rage] During Ancient Rage you gain 8% Movement Speed.

Rip Current.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Enemies that pass through your Shield are slowed by 10% for 2s.

Spring Tide.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Shell Spin heals you for 150 if it hits an enemy.

Surf.card_desc: [Shell Spin] Increase the distance Shell Spin travels by 10%.

Tidal Grace.card_desc: [Shell Shield] Heal for 10% of the damage your Shield absorbs.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Shell Spin] For 2s after using Shell Spin you gain 8% Movement Speed.

Armafuerte.card_desc: [Ancla de dragado] Se reduce la recarga de Ancla de dragado en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Arrecife protector.card_desc: [Protección impenetrable] Su recarga se reduce en {scale=1|1}s por cada 3000 puntos de daño absorbidos.

Caparaz\u00f3n.card_desc: [Protección impenetrable] Protección impenetrable ahora se fija en el suelo, no es canalizada y dura 2s más.

Decisi\u00f3n ancestral.card_desc: [Protección impenetrable] La duración de tu escudo aumenta en {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Determinaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tienes menos de un 50 % de salud recibes un {scale=5|5}% aumento de curación de otros jugadores.

Flujo y reflujo.card_desc: [Armadura] Al llegar al 40% de salud, la recarga de Giro de valva se reduce un {scale=20|20}%.

Gracia de pleamar.card_desc: [Protección impenetrable] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por segundo durante Protección impenetrable.

Leviat\u00e1n.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu salud máxima en 600 PS y obtienes inmunidad al CM durante Ira ancestral.

Marea viva.card_desc: [Giro de valva] Giro de valva te cura {scale=250|250} PS por cada enemigo que alcances.

Masacre.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 6s tras una eliminación.

Onda de choque.card_desc: [Giro de valva] Se reduce la recarga de Giro de valva en {scale=1|1}s cada vez que alcanzas a un enemigo.

Paso de mar.card_desc: [Ancla de dragado] Obtienes {scale=6|6}% de robo de vida tras alcanzar a un enemigo.

Robustez.card_desc: [Ancla de dragado] Obtienes {scale=5|5}% de reducción de daño durante 2 s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con el Ancla de dragado.

Salvamento.card_desc: [Ancla de dragado] Al activar Ancla de dragado, recuperas 1 de munición cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Surf.card_desc: [Giro de valva] La distancia que te desplazas aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Tir\u00f3n.card_desc: [Ancla de dragado] Obtienes un 65% de daño adicional en tu primer tiro tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Ancla de dragado.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Giro de valva] Ganas un {scale=8|8}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s tras Giro de valva.

Arrebenta\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Casco Giratório] O intervalo do Casco Giratório é reduzido em {scale=1|1}s a cada inimigo atingido por ele.

Barreira de Recife.card_desc: [Encouraçado] A cada 3000 de dano absorvido reduz o intervalo do Encouraçado em {scale=1|1}s.

Ben\u00e7\u00e3o das Mar\u00e9s.card_desc: [Encouraçado] Cura {scale=50|50} de vida por segundo durante o Encouraçado.

Bra\u00e7o Forte.card_desc: [Âncora Pesada] Reduz o intervalo da Âncora Pesada em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Carapa\u00e7a.card_desc: [Encouraçado] Aumenta a vida do Encouraçado em {scale=250|250}.

Determina\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=5|5}% mais cura dos outros jogadores quando estiver abaixo de 50% de vida.

For\u00e7a Ancestral.card_desc: [Encouraçado] Aumenta a duração do Encouraçado em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Fortaleza.card_desc: [Âncora Pesada] Recebe {scale=5|5}% de redução de dano por 2s após atingir um inimigo com a Âncora Pesada.

F\u00faria total.card_desc: [Armadura] Recebe {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 6s após conseguir uma eliminação.

Leviat\u00e3.card_desc: [Armadura] Sua vida máxima normal aumenta em 600 e, durante a Fúria Ancestral, você ganha imunidade a controle coletivo.

Manda Bala.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a velocidade de recarga da arma em {scale=7|7}%.

Mar\u00e9 Baixa.card_desc: [Armadura] Ao chegar em 40% de vida o intervalo do Casco Giratório é reduzido em {scale=20|20}%.

Mar\u00e9 Grande.card_desc: [Casco Giratório] O Casco Giratório te cura em {scale=250|250} a cada inimigo atingido.

Marinheiro.card_desc: [Âncora Pesada] Recebe {scale=6|6}% de roubo de vida após atingir um inimigo com a Âncora Pesada.

Meio Casco.card_desc: [Encouraçado] O Encouraçado agora é fixado no chão ao invés de acompanhar Makoa, e dura 2s a mais.

Salvamento.card_desc: [Âncora Pesada] Ativar a Âncora Pesada gera 1 de munição a cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Solavanco.card_desc: [Âncora Pesada] Ganha 65% de dano adicional no disparo dado no inimigo que acabou de ser puxado pela Âncora Pesada.

Surfe.card_desc: [Casco Giratório] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a distância percorrida pelo Casco Giratório.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Casco Giratório] Recebe {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar o Casco Giratório.

\u0411\u0430\u0440\u044c\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Панцирный щит] Каждые 3000 ед. поглощенного урона сокращают перезарядку Панцирного щита на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0432\u043d\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Панцирный щит] Длительность щита увеличивается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0418\u0437\u044f\u0449\u0435\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Панцирный щит] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду во время действия Панцирного щита.

\u041a\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Абордажный якорь] При попадании по врагу Абордажным якорем вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u041a\u0440\u0435\u043f\u043a\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Абордажный якорь] Перезарядка Абордажного якоря сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041a\u0440\u0443\u0448\u0430\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Вращение панциря] Попадание по врагу Вращением панциря сокращает его перезарядку на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041b\u0435\u0432\u0438\u0430\u0444\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Вы получаете иммунитет к эффектам контроля во время действия Древней ярости, а ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на 600 ед.

\u041c\u043e\u0440\u0435 \u043a\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения увеличивают вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 6 с.

\u041c\u043e\u0440\u0441\u043a\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Абордажный якорь] При попадании по врагу Абордажным якорем вы получаете {scale=6|6}% вампиризма.

\u041f\u0430\u043d\u0446\u0438\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Панцирный щит] Панцирный щит становится на {scale=250|250} ед. прочнее.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0432\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Вращение панциря] При попадании по врагу Вращением панциря вы исцеляетесь на {scale=250|250} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u0437\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Панцирный щит] Панцирный щит теперь размещается на земле, не проецируется и действует на 2 с. дольше.

\u041f\u0440\u0438\u0431\u043e\u0439.card_desc: [Вращение панциря] Дальность Вращения панциря увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0420\u0430\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Броня ] При уровне здоровья 40% перезарядка Вращения панциря сокращается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0420\u0435\u0448\u0438\u043c\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 50% вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления от других игроков.

\u0421\u043f\u0430\u0441\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Абордажный якорь] Активация Абордажного якоря генерирует 1 боеприпас каждые 0,5 с. в течение {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0423\u0440\u043e\u0436\u0430\u0439.card_desc: [Абордажный якорь] Первый выстрел после попадания по врагу Абордажным якорем наносит на 65% больше урона.

\u0426\u0443\u043d\u0430\u043c\u0438.card_desc: [Вращение панциря] После использования Вращения панциря ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

Ch\u00f3d matrosa.card_desc: [Drenująca kotwica] Trafienie wroga Drenującą kotwicą zapewnia {scale=6|6}% kradzieży życia.

Determinacja.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy zdrowie spada poniżej 50%, otrzymujesz o {scale=5|5}% więcej leczenia od innych graczy.

Fala zag\u0142ady.card_desc: [Obrót skorupy] Każde trafienie wroga skraca czas odnowienia Obrotu o {scale=1|1} s.

Hartowanie.card_desc: [Drenująca kotwica] Zapewnia {scale=5|5}% redukcji obrażeń przez 2 s po trafieniu wroga Drenującą kotwicą.

Karapaks.card_desc: [Skorupa ochronna] Zwiększa odporność Skorupy ochronnej o {scale=250|250} pkt.

\u0141aska przyp\u0142ywu.card_desc: [Skorupa ochronna] Zapewnia {scale=50|50} PZ na sekundę podczas aktywności Skorupy.

Lewiatan.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa maks. PZ o 600 PZ i odporność na KT podczas trwania Pradawnego szału.

Odzysk.card_desc: [Drenująca kotwica] Aktywacja Drenującej kotwicy generuje 1 szt. amunicji co 0,5 s przez {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

P\u0142yw morski.card_desc: [Obrót skorupy] Obrót skorupy przywraca {scale=250|250} PZ za każdego trafionego wroga.

P\u00f3\u0142skorupa.card_desc: [Skorupa ochronna] Skorupa ochronna jest umieszczana na ziemi, nie musi być ciągle aktywowana i trwa o 2 s dłużej.

Prastara determinacja.card_desc: [Skorupa ochronna] Wydłuża czas trwania Skorupy ochronnej o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Przyp\u0142yw i odp\u0142yw.card_desc: [Pancerz] Gdy twoje zdrowie spadnie do 40%, czas odnowienia Obrotu skorupy zostaje skrócony o {scale=20|20}%.

Rafa koralowa.card_desc: [Skorupa ochronna] Za każde wchłonięte 3000 pkt. obrażeń skraca czas odnowienia Skorupy ochronnej o {scale=1|1} s.

Silne rami\u0119.card_desc: [Drenująca kotwica] Skraca czas odnowienia Drenującej kotwicy o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Skubanie.card_desc: [Drenująca kotwica] Pierwszy strzał po trafieniu wroga Drenującą kotwicą zadaje 65% dodatkowych obrażeń.

Spustoszenie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Udana eliminacja zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 6 s.

Surfing.card_desc: [Obrót skorupy] Zwiększa zasięg Obrotu skorupy o {scale=10|10}%.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Obrót skorupy] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% przez 2 s po użyciu Obrotu skorupy.

Azim.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Canın altındayken diğer oyunculardan %{scale=5|5} artırılmış İyileşme al.

Bahar Gelgiti.card_desc: [Kabuk Çevirme] Kabuk Çevirme ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=250|250} Can iyileşirsin.

Bariyer Resifi.card_desc: [Kabuk Kalkan] Emilen her 3000 hasar için Kabuk Kalkan'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Deniz Kurdu.card_desc: [Tarama Çıpası] Bir düşmana Tarama Çıpası ile vurduktan sonra %{scale=6|6} Can Çalma kazan.

Gelgit Zarafeti.card_desc: [Kabuk Kalkan] Kabuk Kalkan sırasında saniyede {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

G\u00f6z Korkutma.card_desc: [Tarama Çıpası] Tarama Çıpası'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalt.

Kurtarma.card_desc: [Tarama Çıpası] Tarama Çıpası'nı etkinleştirmek {scale=0.5|0.5}.5.5 sn boyunca her 0,5 saniyede 1 cephane oluşturur.

Leviathan.card_desc: [Zırh] Kadim Öfke sırasında Maksimum Canını 600 artır ve KK Bağışıklığı kazan.

Metcezir.card_desc: [Zırh] %40 cana ulaşıldığında Kabuk Çevirme'nin Bekleme Süresi %{scale=20|20} azalır.

Sertle\u015ftirme.card_desc: [Tarama Çıpası] Bir düşmana Tarama Çıpası ile vurduktan sonra 2 sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

S\u00f6rf.card_desc: [Kabuk Çevirme] Kabuk Çevirme'nin gidiş mesafesini %{scale=10|10} artır.

Tsunami.card_desc: [Kabuk Çevirme] Kabuk Çevirme'yi kullandıktan sonra 2 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazanırsın.

Yar\u0131m Kabuk.card_desc: [Kabuk Kalkan] Kabuk Kalkan artık yere yerleştirilir, Yönlendirilmez ve 2 sn daha uzun sürer.

Y\u0131kan Dalga.card_desc: [Kabuk Çevirme] Kabuk Çevirme ile vurduğun her düşman için Bekleme Süresi {scale=1|1} sn azalır.

Y\u0131k\u0131m.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir saf dışı bırakma yaptıktan sonra 6 sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Yol.card_desc: [Tarama Çıpası] Bir düşmanı Tarama Çıpası'yla vurduktan sonra ilk vuruşunda %65 bonus hasar kazan.
